description: A dark staff inscribed with pacts written in languages never meant for mortal eyes. It channels eldritch power from beings beyond realityâ€”old ones, archfey, and fiends. The staff grants tremendous magical power but demands a price: each use brings the wielder closer to their patron's influence. Warlocks who serve powerful entities carry such staffs, marks of their dark bargains.
name: Staff of the Warlock
